What is the block reward at block height 10,080?

The block reward at block height 10,080 is not a fixed value. According to the information, block rewards of 384 and 192 VRSC were timelocked and then unlocked at random block heights starting from block height 10,080.

::: tip * 384, 192 Block Rewards ⏲️
From block height 10,080 on, all block rewards of 384 and 192 VRSC were timelocked and then unlocked at random block heights. The last of those rewards were unlocked at block height 1,181,520.
:::## Block Fees
 Fees are generated from users paying for services and interacting with the protocol. These fees are processed in the blocks and earned by miners and stakers.| Protocol Activity | Fees | 
| :------------- | -------------:| 
| VerusID Registration | 20 - 100 VRSC |
| PBaaS-chain Launch| 10,000 VRSC** |
| Currency/Token Launch | 200 VRSC |
| Conversion Fee | 0.025%, 0.05% |
| Transaction Fee | 0.0001 VRSC  |_**Half the fee (5000) goes to the miners and stakers of the newly launched PBaaS-chain._
